pages.text: $(l)Ender Storage: Storage Anywhere$() $(br2)Ender Storage adds new Ender Chests and Ender Tanks to your world, providing a secure and customizable way to store items and fluids. Access your storage from anywhere, even across dimensions!

$(l)Key Features$() $(br2)- $(l)Ender Chests$(): Store items and access them from any other Ender Chest with the same color code. $(br2)- $(l)Ender Tanks$(): Store fluids and access them from any other Ender Tank with the same color code.
$(l)Customization and Security$() $(br2)- Change the color code by right-clicking the wool pads with dye. $(br2)- Add a diamond to the latch for extra security, linking it to your player.
